long_description: The Eagle Creek Sandman neck pillow wraps around you neck for comfortable support on long plane, train and automobile journeys. Inflates quickly with as few as 2 breaths; deflates in seconds. Microfleece cover is soft and soothing against skin. Sandman firmness is easily adjusted with a touch of the easy adjusting valve; nothing to close, valve is self-sealing. Eagle Creek Sandman pillow folds into itself when deflated to slide easily into a luggage or purse pocket.
